description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

V1.3.0.description:
# **Pokemon Snap Archipelago Manual Version 1.3.0**
**Checks**
-1 Starting check "Zero-One" to unlock 1st level
-62 Normal Pics (Can be enabled/disabled in yaml)
-62  Wonderful Pic (Can be enabled/disabled in yaml)
-34 Same Pokemon Pics
-12 Special Pics
-6 Pokemon Sign Pics
-3 Secret Exits
-3 Rewards for "New Pokemon Pics"
-1 Free Item when "Pokemon Sign Detector" is received
-1 Mew Pic (Victory  Condition)

## **Items**
-6 Courses
-63 New Pokemon Pics
-6 Pokemon Sign Pics
-Pokemon Food
-Pesterball
-Pokeflute
-Dash Engine
-9 "+5 Film"
-Filler Item: Bad Pic

## **Yaml Settings**
-Settings to enable/disable normal and/or wonderful pic checks
-Setting to Exclude locations (i.e. guarantee they are filled with unnecessary items)
V1.3.0.title: Version 1.3.0

V1.3.1.description:
# **Pokemon Snap Archipelago Manual Version 1.3.1**
**Logic Fixes**
-'Pokemon Pic: Articuno' logic updated to require access to "Course Cave" instead of "Course River"
-'Wonderful Pic: Articuno' logic updated to require access to "Course Cave" instead of "Course River"
V1.3.1.title: Version 1.3.1

V1.3.2.description:
# **Pokemon Snap Archipelago Manual Version 1.3.2**
**Client Fixes**
-Updated ManualClient.py to the latest Manual AP build version to make the manual client open properly on Archipelago 0.6.2

**Logic Fixes**
-'Wonderful Pic: Sandslash' logic updated so that Dash Engine can put the check in logic as an alternative to Pester Ball. Logic is now "Course Valley AND (Pester Ball OR Dash Engine)"
V1.3.2.title: Version 1.3.2

V1.4.0.description:
# **Pokemon Snap Archipelago Manual Version 1.4.0**
**Starting Course Change**

- The "Zero-One" check (used to provide the  player with the first course) has been removed from the apworld
- A random course will be granted to the player as a free starting item and is treated as a "sphere 0" check. This makes the checks in the starting course "sphere 1" adjusting world generation

**Yaml Setting Change**

- A new category  of checks has been created, Hard Checks. The following 5 checks are in this category
       - Same Pkmn: Arcanine
       - Same Pkmn: Psyduck
       - Same Pkmn: Cloyster
       -Same Pkmn: Magikarp
       - Same Pkmn: Dratini    
- Enabling Hard Checks has been added as a yaml setting. It is false by  default and recommended to be kept false for early runs. These checks are very RNG dependent and some can be quite difficult
V1.4.0.title: Version 1.4.0

V1.4.1.description:
# **Pokemon Snap Archipelago Manual Version 1.4.1**
**Yaml Setting Failsafe**
Added a line of code that forces "normal pics" to be enabled if a yaml submitted for generation has both "normal pics enabled" and "wonderful pics enabled" set to false to prevent failure of generation due to too few locations to place items.
V1.4.1.title: Version 1.4.1
